questions.question: Problem Generalised Hanoi ({n_discs} discs, {n_pegs} pegs): What is the minimum number of moves required to transfer all discs from the start peg to the end peg?
questions.answer: The minimum number of moves is an open problem for the general case (n_pegs > 3). The optimal solution is generally found using a recursive approach (Frame-Stewart algorithm or similar) which minimizes the total number of transfers.
